'I'm here!'%K%P
'Come on in.'%K%P
Ready for practice,\nKagura came bounding into the shop.%K%P
She looked as though she'd completely\nrecovered from yesterday's incident.%K%P
'Okay, so for today I was thinking we should\nput together a new music video.'%K%P
'It'd be a good way of showcasing your charms,\ndon't you think?'%K%P
'Oh, about that.\nI've decided to quit.'%K%P
'Hmm? Quit what?'%K%P
'The last round of the auditions, duh.'%K%P
'So there's no need for a new video.'%K%P
'Oh, I see. In that case... Wait, what?'%K%P
'Geez, aren't you listening?\nI'm pulling out of the contest, okay?'%K%P
Kagura laughed casually as she\ndropped the bomb.%K%P
As for me, I could barely comprehend\nwhat was going on, and had to ask again.%K%P
'Wh-What are you talking about?\nThis is a joke, right?'%K%P
'I'm serious.\nI never had a chance anyway.'%K%P
'What? Why would you...'%K%P
The words caught in my throat as the\nrealization hit me.%K%P
'Is this because of what you read online yesterday?'%K%P
'That's part of it, I guess.\nAfter I went home, I sat down and thought about it.'%K%P
'And I realized the reason that I'd made it this far\nwas because of Shuri.%K%P
'I told you, it's not like that at all!'%K%P
'And what about your promise with Shuri?\nThat you'd take on the final round together.'%K%P
'Haha, there's no way!\nI'll never be as good as her.'%K%P
'Don't say that,\nyou're a match for Shuri any day.'%K%P
Even if you think that's the case,\nnot everyone else sees me that way.%K%P
'You can't let criticism like that get to you.\nIt's not like you to give up so easily.'%K%P
'...That's not all.'%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
'I said that's not all!'%K%P
Kagura shouted,\nnearly biting my head off in the process.%K%P
'There's no way I could get through the final round,\nI'm just an add-on for Shuri, remember?'%K%P
'Now that I know I've got no chance of winning,\nI can stop pushing myself so hard.'%K%P
'Are you really serious about this?'%K%P
'Yeah, I've never really liked\ncompeting against or trying to beat people.'%K%P
'I only started out trying to join L☆SEVEN\nbecause it kinda looked like fun...'%K%P
'I was never really serious about joining them\nthe way Shuri is...'%K%P
'You're lying.'%K%P
'No, it's the truth.'%K%P
I'll be happy just doing what I used to do,\ndancing on stage at the cafe,\nand being an idol on the net.%K%P
I shook my head.\nI just couldn't accept this.%K%P
'It's not. You know it's not.'%K%P
'You wanted to join L☆SEVEN\njust as much as Shuri does, maybe even more.'%K%P
'How would you know?'%K%P
'Because I've been right here beside you\nthe whole time.'%K%P
I'd spent so long watching Kagura train\nthat I could tell.%K%P
That she was always striving forward,\nworking her hardest to be worthy of L☆SEVEN...%K%P
'You just don't get it...\nYou don't understand how I feel at all!'%K%P
'Huh? Hey, Kagura!'%K%P
Kagura abruptly turned her back to me,\nand ran right out the door.%K%P
Without stopping to think, I dashed after her.%K%P
'Where could she have run off to? Damn...'%K%P
I managed to chase her into the center of town,\nbut lost sight of her after that.%K%P
With so many people around,\nthere was no way I would find her.%K%P
'I guess I can try calling her...'%K%P
She probably wouldn't answer,\nbut I called Kagura's cell just in case.%K%P
'...She's not picking up.'%K%P
Of course she wasn't,\nwhat had I expected?%K%P
Realizing that it was no use,\nI decided to hang up.%K%P
'What next...'%K%P
Obviously,\nI couldn't just leave her like this.%K%P
Kagura and I had worked so hard together,\nwe were like partners.%K%P
'I can't afford to sit around wasting time'%K%P
I had to find Kagura and fast.\nBut I couldn't just run around searching randomly.%K%P
'Think... Where would she go...'%K%P
Off the top of my head, I could only think of\nthe cafe where she worked or my family's store.%K%P
Obviously, she wouldn't be in either of those places\nat a time like this.%K%P
'That only leaves one other option.'%K%P
I decided to take action.\nThere was somewhere else Kagura might be.%K%P
In case of emergencies, she had given me\nher home address.%K%P
'Here I am...'%K%P
It was a pretty long walk from Akiba,\nbut I eventually arrived at Kagura's apartment.%K%P
A totally normal-looking building,\nno one would have ever guessed a goddess lived there.%K%P
But this was the place,\nassuming she'd given me the right address.%K%P
'Now I just have to find her apartment.'%K%P
Finding myself outside Kagura's door,\nI took a deep breath.%K%P
I knocked hard,\nmaking sure she'd definitely hear if she was inside.%K%P
'Kagura, are you there? It's me, Yamato.'%K%P
I yelled through the door but there was no reply.\nI doubt she was in any mood to talk to me, though.%K%P
But then an idea came to me,\nI called her cell.%K%P
'Ack!'%K%P
Through the door I heard the sound of not only\nKagura's ringtone, but also a surprised cry.%K%P
I'd been right. It was Kagura's voice.%K%P
There was the sound of someone moving around,\nthen the ringtone stopped.%K%P
'Kagura, you're in there, right?'%K%P
'Don't try to pretend you're not.\nI heard your voice just now.'%K%P
'Look, I know you're there.\nPlease answer me.'%K%P
'Me-Meooow...'%K%P
'That's not fooling anyone.'%K%P
That was Kagura's voice,\nno doubt about it.%K%P
She didn't really think I'd\nfall for that, did she?%K%P
'Urgh, why did you come here, anyway?'%K%P
'I want to talk to you. Why else would I be here?'%K%P
'I've got nothing to say to you,\nnothing at all.'%K%P
'Then just listen, okay?'%K%P
'You know, I can't just accept that\nyou'd give up on the audition just like that.'%K%P
'Why not? It's got nothing to do with you!'%K%P
'This is my problem,\njust leave me alone.'%K%P
'I can't do that, either.\nIt's not only your problem, you know.'%K%P
There was still a door between us,\nbut I responded firmly.%K%P
'You're the one who asked me\nto help you out, after all.'%K%P
'It's not really fair to rope me into this then say\nit's got nothing to do with me, right?'%K%P
'Hmm... But that...'%K%P
'Don't get me wrong.\nI didn't come here to give you a guilt trip.'%K%P
'It's just...\nI don't want you to give up this easily.'%K%P
'...Why not?'%K%P
When I first teamed up with Kagura and Shuri,\nI was mainly just going with the flow.%K%P
But after spending so much time together,\na new ambition was taking root in my heart.%K%P
She was always so positive and honest.\nI just wanted to help make her dreams come true...%K%P
At some point, helping Kagura\nhad become my heart's fondest desire.%K%P
'Because you're more qualified to be an idol\nthan anyone else.'%K%P
'...Why do you think that?'%K%P
'I don't think, I know it. There's no way I couldn't\nafter working with you for so long.'%K%P
I'd said the same thing before,\nand I still meant it.%K%P
Kagura had the potential\nto become a superstar, and I knew it.%K%P
She had what the others needed,\nthat amazing raw talent to become an idol.%K%P
'I'll say it loud and proud, as many times as it\ntakes to get through to you.'%K%P
'You're more qualified to be an idol\nthan anyone I know, Kagura.'%K%P
'There's one other thing I want you to remember.\nYou're not alone in this.'%K%P
'For what it's worth, I'll always be here for you\nif you need me.'%K%P
I packed all the passion I had into those words.%K%P
I imagined how Kagura looked when she was dancing,\nso full of joy and life.%K%P
I wished more people could see her dance like that.\nI wanted her to realize...%K%P
Because I...%K%P
'...Why would you go this far\njust to help me?'%K%P
'Because I like you.'%K%P
'Huh...'%K%P
'Not just as an idol or a goddess,\nbut as a girl...'%K%P
'I like you, Kagura.'%K%P
Well, the cat was out of the bag now.%K%P
Those feelings had come welling up from the depths\nof my heart. Even if she hadn't been a goddess,\nI knew Kagura would know how I felt.%K%P
In silence, I waited for some kind of response.%K%P
I was prepared to stand there in front of her door\nuntil she was ready to speak to me again.%K%P
The door of her apartment slowly opened\nright before my eyes.%K%P
And finally,\nKagura showed her face.%K%P
'Kagura...!'%K%P
'Hehe...'%K%P
She stepped out of her room,\ngiggling bashfully as she looked at me.%K%P
'Phew.\nI was getting ready to wait out here all night.'%K%P
'Sorry, Yamato. I...'%K%P
'It's okay. More importantly,\nabout the audition...\nDo you still want to quit?' %K%P
'No, I'm over that now.'%K%P
'So you mean...?'%K%P
'Yeah. I'll try seeing this through to the end.'%K%P
'Are you sure?'%K%P
'How could I give up after that stirring speech?\nI wouldn't be worthy of being a goddess\nif I gave up now'%K%P
Kagura shot me a smile.%K%P
It was the same bright, cheery smile I'd grown\nto know and love.%K%P
'Good, I had a feeling\nyou'd feel that way.'%K%P
'Hehe! Thanks, Yamato.'%K%P
'I feel totally recharged now,\nthanks to you.'%K%P
'I must be a pretty pathetic goddess\nto need cheering up.'%K%P
'Everyone needs someone to turn to now and then.\nEven goddesses.'%K%P
'We all go through hard times, sad times.\nThere's nothing wrong with supporting each other.'%K%P
'Yamato... Yeah, you're right.\nHehehe. Thanks again. I really mean it.'%K%P
'No problem.\nI'm happy to help you out anytime.'%K%P
'You know... Talking to you like this helped me\nremember something really important.'%K%P
'What's that?'%K%P
'I want to make lots of people smile.'%K%P
'That's the whole reason I wanted to be an idol\nin the first place!'%K%P
Kagura's smile was truly dazzling now.%K%P
Seeing it made me more sure than ever that\nI was right.%K%P
Kagura had the potential to rise to the top\nof the idol world.%K%P
Higher than Shuri...\nEven higher than L☆SEVEN!%K%P
'I'm ready to give it my all.\nSo, uh... Nice to be working with you again.'%K%P
'It's good to have you back. Let's get to it!'%K%P
I doubt I could have felt happier\ngiving my response to Kagura.%K%P
This was a brand new start for Kagura and me!%K%P
